flawed_nl_solution:
When 43 books were checked out on Wednesday, Suzy remained with 98 - 43 = <<98-43=51>>51 books
After 23 books were returned on Thursday, she ended with 51 + 23 = <<51+23=74>>74 books
However, 5 books were checked out on the same day meaning that 74 - 5 = <<69=69>>69 books were left.
After 7 books were returned on Friday, Suzy had 69 + 7 = <<69+7=76>>76 books
#### 76

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 55, not 51. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
